law.catch_line: Appeal to board of lay-off by continuing status employee.

text.section: A continuing status employee may appeal his lay-off on the grounds that the procedures in KRS 156.832 were not followed.

An appeal filed by a continuing status employee shall be filed with the board within thirty (30) days of the effective date of the lay-off. The board shall hear any appeal filed by a continuing status employee within sixty (60) days of the filing date, and it shall render a final order within ninety (90) days of the filing date.

law.history: Repealed, reenacted, renumbered, and amended 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 59, sec. 20, effective June 25, 2013. -- Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 475, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1994.
